description: Because when its rest break if i'm not back on in five minutes it takes away time.
I just doesn't work. Keeps crashing every time I try to launch it.
In Foreda 26, this app can not run.
It's a good alternative to sciroco Take a Break for windows.
It works well in fedora 26 + KDE, I did not try with GNOME.
Nothing fancy. Simply does it work efficiently.

Workrave is fundamentally awful. It tells you to stop when "you're in the flow". However, this is exactly what it's supposed to do. For people who are likely to get RSI, this software is a life-saver.
summary: You'll hate it, but it's good for you

description:
I've lived 5+ years with RSI, and the best solution to it I've found is just to not abuse my hands. Taking breaks is not enough, but it is a fundamental part of this, and that's where Workrave shines, since you can program it to force you to take breaks (and you have to or you'll just skip them all).
I trully recommend it.
summary: Can fix your RSI, if you'll let it

Great little app that provide all the required features!

Drawback is that on Kubuntu 19.10 the Xembedsniproxy process to show the app in the system tray puts a lot of load on the CPU.

description: I recall it working flawlessly before. But now in Ubuntu 19 it does not show up in the tray, I can not view it using GUI (it disappears from the list of launched apps), it only blocks input once (instead of doing so repeatedly, after each interval is over), etc. Please fix.
summary: It worked perfectly in the past

great and helpfull for me.
Ubuntu 20.04
I enjoy it over pomodoro apps because of its focus on health, rather than mere productivity. I would love to see workrave being compatible with pomodoro logics, too, however.

description: Me gusta su ayuda para acordarme de hacer pausas
Excelente, me recuerda tomar mis descansos y optimizar mi trabajo, se pueden saltar los descanso si se desea.
La iniciativa es interesante
Au bout de quelques temps l'application ne fonctionne plus :(
Très dérangeant! et abrutissant!  Ne respecte pas notre action en cours et nous empêche de faire quoique ce soit dans nos opérations... et bogue constamment. Difficile à désinstaller.

Application très utile pour pouvoir faire des coupures systématiques dans le travail informatique, afin de s'obliger à faire des exercices physiques et éviter de s'abrutir totalement au fil des heures de travail à l'écran! Mais, depuis la dernière version Ubuntu, il ne se lance plus automatiquement au démarrage, et les fenêtres de gestion ne sont plus accessibles... Y a-t-il une solution?...
summary: Ne se lance plus automatiquement depuis dernière version Ubuntu!
